devdoc.details: This contract is an authorized fork of Angle's `RewardHandler` contract https://github.com/AngleProtocol/angle-transmuter/blob/main/contracts/monetizer/facets/RewardHandler.sol

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

sellRewards(uint256,bytes).details: It is impossible to sell a token that is a collateral through this functionTrusted sellers and governance only may call this functionOnly governance can set which tokens can be swapped through this function by passing a prior approval transaction to Odos router for the token to be swapped
